S04bsu037_u:17: trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātau ye kecit sattvā anuśāsanadharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenāṃjaliṃ praṇamya upasaṃkrāntāḥ /

S04bsu037_u:21: ye sattvā nāgayakṣarākṣasapretapiśācabhūtāste buddhānusmṛtiṃ prāpya sarvasattveṣu maitracittā bhūtvā kāyacittasukhaṃ labdhvā dharmaśravaṇāya yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S04bsu037_u:22: ye sattvā yamaloke andhatamisrāyāṃ jātāste 'pi buddhānubhāvena ekakṣaṇaṃ smṛtiṃ labdhvā parasparaṃ saṃjānate sma /
S04bsu037_u:26: tena khalu samayena mahāpṛthivī ṣaḍ vikāraṃ prakampate unnamati avanamati sma /
S04bsu037_u:27: atha tasyāṃ parṣadi maṃjuśrīkumārabhūtaḥ sanniṣaṇṇaḥ san bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāryāvalokiteśvarametadavocat /

S04bsu037_u:54: ayaṃ ca yathā samāgatā sarvabodhisattvānāṃ parṣad bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikā parṣad[ete sarve]śrutvā mānanāṃ pūjanāṃ kurvanti sma /
S04bsu037_u:57_0: sarvakāmaṃ gatāḥ kṛtasarvāśāḥ samṛdhyante vigatavyādhayaḥ saṃvṛttā paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ

S04bsu037_u:61_5: dhṛtimantaḥ sarvarājānāṃ sarvarājñīnāṃ rājaputrāmātyānāṃ sarvaśatrūṇāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ

S04bsu037_u:74: bodhau ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayiṣyanti satkṛtya likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti nāmadheyaṃ ca

S04bsu037_u:180: yaśca mayā kulaputra dharmo bhāṣitaḥ paryāvāptaḥ taṃ sarvaṃ satkare gurukare mānaye pūjaye satkṛtya likhaye likhāpaye /

S04bsu037_u:195: ayaṃ ca dharmaparyāyaṃ vaistarikīkariṣyāmaḥ rakṣiṣyāmaḥ yenāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaściraśtitiko bhaviṣyati /

S04bsu037_u:473_0: sa ce uttarapūrvapaścimāyāṃ pracare tat parakarmābhiyuktāste sattvā bhaviṣyanti na
S04bsu037_u:473_1: śroṣyanti śraddhāsyanti na pattīṣyanti na pūjayiṣyanti hīnavīryanaṣṭasmṛtayo nānāvyākṣepakuṭambadāsadāsībhogaiśvaryahāsyalāsyanāṭyanṛtyagīterṣyāmātsaryasmṛtayo
S04bsu037_u:473_2: na śroṣyanti na pattīṣyanti napūjayiṣyanti te aparimuktā eva jarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhya
S04bsu037_u:474_0: tasmāttarhi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvāpāyairātmānaṃ parimoktukāmena
S04bsu037_u:474_1: satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ pūjayitavyo dhārayitavyaḥ satkartavyaḥ parebhyaḥ saṃprakāśatitavyo
S04bsu037_u:475_1: imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ pūjayitvā vācayitavyaḥ dhvaje vā ucchrapitaṃ kṛtvā pūjayitvā
S04bsu037_u:476: caturdiśe baliṃ īttvābhinamaskṛtya puṣpadhūpagandhaiḥ sarva ityupadravāḥ praśamaṃ yāsyanti /
S04bsu037_u:478: atha bhagavān tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata /
S04bsu037_u:479: [sarvasya sattvasya anugrahārthaṃ] yā bhāṣitā pūrvabhaveṣu nāyakaiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:480: [ahaṃ tathā tvāmapi deśayiṣye] gṛṇhāhi ānanda imaṃ samādhim // Stav_1 //
S04bsu037_u:481: yaścaiva traidhātukadānu dadyā saptāna ratnāna ca pūrayitvā /
S04bsu037_u:483: buddheṣu dharmeṣu sadāpramattaḥ upamāpi tasya na sa bhonti dānam // Stav_2 //
S04bsu037_u:485: yaścaiva sūtraṃ[ca] dhareti kaści ayaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu bheṣyate // Stav_3 //
S04bsu037_u:486: yaścāpi ekaṃ kṣipayeta puṣpaṃ vastraṃ ca mālyaṃ ca vilepanaṃ tathā /
S04bsu037_u:487: imaṃ samādhiṃ ca[ya] satkareta nāyaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu bhoti // Stav_4 //
S04bsu037_u:489: yaścāpi kārṣāpaṇu dānu dadyā imasya sūtrasya ca pūjanārtham /
S04bsu037_u:490: janitvā bodhāya ca maitracitte ayaṃ tato bahutaru puṇyu prāpnuyā // Stav_5 //
S04bsu037_u:491: yaścāpi sattveṣu imaṃ samādhiṃ prakāśaye deśayi bodhisattvaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:492: pratipādaye bodhimanuttare tathā upamāpi puṇyaṃpi na tasya bhoti // Stav_6 //
S04bsu037_u:493: imaṃ ca śrutvā tatha ānuśaṃsāḥ kṛtvā ca maitraṃ tatha sarvasattvaiḥ /
S04bsu037_u:495: tasmāpi sūtram imu dhārayeta likheta vāceta tathā prakāśaye // Stav_7 //
S04bsu037_u:497: upapadyamānā narakeṣu pretayo mā paścakāle parītāpyu bheṣyatha // Stav_8 //
S04bsu037_u:499: kosmābhi trāṇaṃ bhavate parāyaṇaṃ mukhe mukhaṃ prekṣati bālabuddhiḥ // Stav_9 //
S04bsu037_u:501: [yasmā tathāgatamabhipūjayitvā] bauddhaṃ ca dharmaṃ tatha sāṃghikañca /
S04bsu037_u:502: hariṣya neṣye yamaloki dāruṇe na tasya trāṇaṃ sada kaści bheṣyati // Stav_10 //
S04bsu037_u:503: na putradāraṃ na ca mitrabāndhavān na cāpi rāṣṭraṃ na ca hāsyalāsyam /
S04bsu037_u:504: dhanaṃ na dhānyaṃ na ca vastrabhūṣaṇaṃ sarvaṃ jahitvā puna duḥkhadāruṇam // Stav_11 //
S04bsu037_u:505: imaṃ samādhiṃ na ca śraddadhitvā tathā[ca duḥkhaṃ]dāruṇaṃ vedayate /
S04bsu037_u:507: ima duḥkhu śrutvā imu ānuśaṃsāḥ ko bālabuddhirna jane prasādam // Stav_12 //
S04bsu037_u:508: tasmācca tairhi sada bhikṣubhikṣuṇī upāsakopāsikarājabhiḥ sadā /
S04bsu037_u:509: imaṃ ca sūtraṃ sada dhārayitvā satkāru nityaṃ ca kartavyadhārake // Stav_13 //
S04bsu037_u:511: udgṛhītaṃ mayā bhagavan imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ śāstṛsaṃjñayā dhārayiṣyāmi pūjayiṣyāmi sarvasattvebhyaḥ saṃprakāśayiṣyāmi /
S04bsu037_u:513_0: yadi tvamānanda yanmayā dharmo bhāṣitaḥ śruto dhārayituṃ tat sarvaṃ na dhāraye na
S04bsu037_u:513_1: vācaye na pūjaye na vaistārikīkuryā tvayā mama nāparādhye na cāśuśrūṣā kṛtā bhave na cāśrāvakatvam /
S04bsu037_u:515: na vācaye na pūjaye na saṃprakāśaye na manasikuryā sa mām aparādhye aśuśrūṣā kṛtā bhave aśrāvakatvaṃ bhave /
S04bsu037_u:516: tasmāttarhi tvamānanda satkṛtya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo dhārayitavyaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:517: ayaṃ te tathāgatasyānuttarasamyaksaṃbodhatathāgatakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati paścime kāle paścime samaye sarvasattvānām /
S04bsu037_u:518: asmin khalu punardharmaparyāye bhagavatā bhāṣyamāṇe ṣaṣṭīnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni saptānāṃ śatānāṃ bodhisattvasamādhipratilaṃbho 'bhūt /
S04bsu037_u:522: ayaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ paścimakāle paścimasamaye teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ śrotṝṇāṃ dhārayitṝṇāṃ mānayitṝṇāṃ teṣāṃ ca lekhakānāṃ tathāgatakṛtyaṃ kariṣyati /
S04bsu037_u:524_0: ye ca sattvāḥ paścime kāle paścime[sama]ye hāsyanāṭyagītavāditeṣu nānāvyākṣepabahulā
S04bsu037_u:524_2: na pūjayiṣyanti na mānayiṣyanti na śraddhāsyanti na pattīyiṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti
S04bsu037_u:525: te taṃ pūrvakarmaśubhaphalaṃ parikṣepaṃ kṛtvā nānāduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ (Dutt 88)
S04bsu037_u:528: dīrgharātramakalyāṇamitravaśāḥ paścānutāpino bhaviṣyanti imaṃ kṣaṇaṃ virāgayitvā /
S04bsu037_u:530: buddhadharmasaṃghe[a]bhedyaprasādena sarvasattveṣu maitracittena īrṣyāmātsaryadauḥśīlyacittaparivarjitena krodhaparivarjitena bhavitavyam /
S04bsu037_u:531: atha sā yathāsamāgatā parṣa taistaiḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraiḥ tathāgataṃ pūjayati sma /
S04bsu037_u:533: tad yathā sādhu sādhu bhagavan subhāṣitamidaṃ mahādharmaparyāyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya tathāgataśāsanacirasthityartham /
S04bsu037_u:535: kiṃnāmāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaparyāyaḥ kathaṃ ca vayaṃ bhagavan dhārayāmaḥ /
S04bsu037_u:537: tasmāttarhi tvamānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ sarvatathāgatajñānabodhisattvabhūmikramaṇamityapi nāma dhāraya /
S04bsu037_u:541: āttamānāḥ āryāvalokiteśvaramaṃjuśrīvajrapāṇiprabhṛtayaḥ sarve bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarve ca mahāśrāvakāḥ sarve ca śakrabrahmalokapālāścatvāraśca (Dutt 89)
S04bsu037_u:543: sā ca sarvāvatī parṣayathāsamāgatā bhagavato bhāṣitamabhinandya[sādhukāramadāt /
